attributes.action: so a child can't leave home at 16 until after they have sat their exams
attributes.additional_details: if you know where your child is and they are safe and well the police cant bring them home. parents can be prosecuted and even face prison for not making sure their child attends full time education until they are 18 years old and the exam board can fine you for your child not sitting their exams.
attributes.background: Surley this has happened to so many parents and will continue happening to so many more if we don't take action now! your child doesn't come home they are 16 you know where they are safe & well but you don't agree with where they are staying and they aren't attending school or sitting their exams

rejection.details: We're not sure what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
